Reaction to Chilean ex-president Pinera's death in helicopter crashChilean ex-President Sebastian Pinera, who ran the country from 2010-2014 and 2018-2022, died in a helicopter crash on Tuesday in the south of the country. Authorities recovered his body and there will be a state funeral on Friday.
